data.name: 发糖模拟器
data.detailed_description:
Once again you hear a whisper in your dream. The sticky voice, as if made of inorganic matter, sang a long string of obscure syllables. The darkness wriggled, and a sight came from the deepest depths. It is the most powerful and ineffable being. The initial nerve-shredding fear has given way to a luscious stillness, and you now know your destiny. Offering tribute to the great being, may he break free from his cage and bring chaos back!

By combining the mechanics of lucky landlords and other roguelikes, the sugar simulator transforms the traditional idea of using cards to fight enemies into the interaction of cards, which can bring permanent changes to a player's deck and make deck construction more dynamic.

Gameplay Introduction

  • Collect cards and relics: Cards produce tributes, and make good use of the link effect generated by cards and relics to produce more tributes and offer them to evil gods.
  • Rotation random deal: The player's deck is randomly distributed to the field, forming a circle end to end, from beginning to end settlement effect.
  • Sacrifice: Offer tribute to the evil god to unlock the seal, and finally summon the evil god. If the tribute is insufficient, the evil god will be angered and the game will fail.

data.short_description: 《Fhtagn!》 is a minimal deck build game that player collects spirits to break the seal of old gods. Try combos of unique relics and cards to collect more spirits!
